channel.title: people on Portfolio Site
channel.description: Recent content in people on Portfolio Site

item.title: Nuottaniemi
item.description: Sunset over the waters of Helsinki, from Uutela, Taken on Nikon D5100

item.title: Lucy and Rebecca
item.description: Cosplayers of Lucy and Rebecca from Cyberpunk: Edgerunners, seen at Comicon hosted in Utrect. Taken on Nikon D7000

item.title: 2B Cosplay
item.description: My cosplay of 2B from Nier Franchise, taken under an Abandonded Train Station near Lelystad. Taken on Panasonic DMC-FZ50.

item.title: Central Station
item.description: Amsterdam Central train station captured in the early hours of evening, in the Netherlands. Taken on OnePlus 7T Pro

item.title: Exposure Sculpture
item.description: Antony Gormleys Exposure Sculpture in the evening just outside Lelystad in the Netherlands. Taken on OnePlus 7T Pro.

item.title: Filming Tim Henson
item.description: Through the crowd shot of Tim Henson of Polyphia with person filming in the foreground. Taken using a OnePlus 7T Pro at SWG3 Galvanizers, Glasgow

item.title: Tim and Scott
item.description: Stylistically edited photo of Tim Henson and Scott LePage of Polyphia playing back to back in the smoke at SGW3 Galvanizers, Glasgow. Taken using a OnePlus 7T Pro

item.title: Tim Henson 2
item.description: Tim Henson of Polyphia under colourful lighting at SGW3 Galvanizers, Glasgow. Taken using a OnePlus 7T Pro.

item.title: Tim Henson under lights
item.description: Tim Henson of Polyphia under bright lighting and smoke at SGW3 Galvanizers, Glasgow. Taken using a Google Pixel 7 Pro.

item.title: Église Saint-Roch de Montpellier
item.description: Side alley leading upto Église Saint-Roch de Montpellier, which is adorned in gorgeous sculptures. Taken using a Nikon D5100

item.title: Grand Hotel du Midi
item.description: Picturesque hotel nestled the cramped central streets of Montpellier, France. Taken using a Nikon D5100

item.title: La Tour de la Babote
item.description: The silhouette of a couple standing in La Tour de la Babote Taken using a Nikon D5100

item.title: Rue de Maguelone
item.description: People, tramlines and palm trees leading towards the Montpellier Saint-Roch train station in early evening, France. Taken using a Nikon D5100

item.title: Blue Silhouette
item.description: Experiment with colour silhouette self portrait shots. Taken on Google Pixel 6 Pro

item.title: The Reytons 2022
item.description: The smoke filled crowds at the Barrowlands in Glasgow, during a concert performed by The Reytons. Taken using a OnePlus 7T Pro

item.title: Time to Contemplate
item.description: Man sitting secluded on park bench in Strawberry Hill Garden, London. Taken on OnePlus 7T Pro

item.title: Floriańska
item.description: Floriańska a 13th century street in the heart of Krakow old town, during rainfall. Taken on OnePlus 7T Pro
